summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Corporation Counsel to employ necessary clerical assistance in the preparation of transcript of record, supplemental to former transcript furnished Grant Smith & Company, covering the issuance of Cedar River Water System Bonds in the sum of $2,250,000.00, authorized under the provisions of Ordinance No. 18631, said supplemental transcript, including all ordinances, resolutions, Council proceedings, Board of Public Works proceedings, together with all other proceedings and contracts, relating to sale or disposal of Cedar River Water Supply Fund Warrants, subsequent to Ordinance No. 3990.
